headerText: The `v-subheader` component is used to separate sections of lists.

usage.desc: Subheaders in their simplest form display a subheading with default theme.

inset.desc: Inset subheaders are moved 72px to the right. This gives you the option to line them up with list items and inset dividers.

grid.desc: A subheader can add context to what a user is looking at.

menu.desc: Using a subheader can help separate different types of actions.

social.desc: Using a subheader with social media interaction.
